## Import Data
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
gdp <- read_csv(file = "gdp_pcap.csv")
energy <- read_csv(file = "energy_use_per_person.csv")
```
## PivotLonger
```{r}
energy_long <- energy |> 
  pivot_longer(cols = `1960`:`2015`,
               names_to = "Year",
               values_to = "Energy_Use")
```
